TopicTitle: [X-Wing Series] Cygnus XG-1 Starwing Assault Gunboat

Articles.Content:
Anyone remember playing the Star Wars X-Wing series games? I'm recreating various craft from X-Wing, TIE Fighter, X-Wing vs. TIE Fighter, and X-Wing Alliance. This craft was used by the Empire and it was seen in all the X-Wing games. The Cygnus XG-1 Starwing Assault Gunboat. This craft may not be the best at dogfighting, but it was heavily armed...

![tUBNiam.png](http://i.imgur.com/tUBNiam.png)

I seriously wished they had square intakes and rectangular structures...

![AHo7sVo.png](http://i.imgur.com/AHo7sVo.png)

![mRLCrX6.png](http://i.imgur.com/mRLCrX6.png)

![OzTby46.png](http://i.imgur.com/OzTby46.png)

This thing can go past Mach 2 in a short time...

![SCfloFM.png](http://i.imgur.com/SCfloFM.png)

It has reached orbit!

![umgdayp.png](http://i.imgur.com/umgdayp.png)

Craft file: [http://www./download/gzckkb8z9jogba4/Assault_Gunboat.craft](http://www./download/gzckkb8z9jogba4/Assault_Gunboat.craft)

Love it ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) although my encounter with the craft was as a pilot in TIE-Fighter.. good days.. still good to this day if you can fire it up on dosbox.. how I wish games were still that good.. atleast we have KSP ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Nice gunboat! Although you've forgot some things - namely ion cannons (in the tailroot) and missile racks (should be in place of intakes).

> 
> Nice gunboat! Although you've forgot some things - namely ion cannons (in the tailroot) and missile racks (should be in place of intakes).

Yes but .. this one actually flys.. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Say we slap Twin Ion Engines on the back of a TIE fighter as per prototypical specifications... it'll be a long long time before anyone gets anywhere.. perhaps end of the runway.. not so much a galaxy far far away.. it'll still be far far away for the rest of eternity no? ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Love it ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) although my encounter with the craft was as a pilot in TIE-Fighter.. good days.. still good to this day if you can fire it up on dosbox.. how I wish games were still that good.. atleast we have KSP ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I first encountered the Assault Gunboat in X-Wing. They're a much bigger nuisance than TIE Bombers as they tend to fire missiles at you a lot and that was annoying.

> 
> Nice gunboat! Although you've forgot some things - namely ion cannons (in the tailroot) and missile racks (should be in place of intakes).

Yeah, I uploaded this before I thought about the ion cannon bit... I should have placed antennae in the tailroot... missile racks, I was more concerned the flight capability of the ship... and thought that placing something at the intake area might affect the ship's flight.
